changeSet.author: Mbarek
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_TAX set UUID =concat('TAX-', id)
update BILLING_CYCLE set UUID = concat('BillingCycle-', id)

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CAT_PRODUCT_OFFER_TMPL_CAT (product_id, offer_template_cat_id, indx) SELECT id, cat_offer_template_cat_id, 0 FROM cat_offer_template WHERE cat_offer_template_cat_id IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: TyshanShi
TyshanShi
changeSet.sql: update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from CAT_CHARGE_TEMPLATE where id =(select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'RecurringChargeTemplate_%' or a.code like 'OneShotChargeTemplate_%' or a.code like 'UsageChargeTemplate_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_INVOICE_CAT where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'InvoiceCategory_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_INVOICE_SUB_CAT where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'InvoiceSubCategory_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from BILLING_TAX where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'Tax_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from CAT_PRICE_PLAN_MATRIX where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'PricePlanMatrix_%'

update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CODE =(select (code) from ADM_TITLE where id = (select cast(substring(code, position('_' in code)+1) as ${cast.long}) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id)) where a.code like 'Title_%'
update ADM_MESSAGES a set ENTITY_CLASS =(select substring(code,0, position('_' in code)) from ADM_MESSAGES b where a.id=b.id) where a.code like '%_%'
alter table ADM_MESSAGES drop column code

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ORD_ORDER set UUID ='ORDER-'|| id

changeSet.author: pbach
changeSet.sql: update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, ',', ',"') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, ')}', '")}') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

update WF_ACTION set ACTION_EL = REPLACE(ACTION_EL, 'routedToUserGroup', 'routeToUserGroup') where WF_TRANSITION_ID in (select ID from WF_TRANSITION where WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF'));

changeSet.author: pbach
changeSet.sql: update WF_TRANSITION set FROM_STATUS = 'ACKNOWLEDGED', TO_STATUS = 'IN_PROGRESS' where FROM_STATUS is NULL and TO_STATUS is NULL and WORKFLOW_ID in (select id from wf_workflow where wf_type='org.meveo.admin.wf.types.OrderWF');

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.MeasurableQuantity' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.MeasurableQuantity'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.BarChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.BarChart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.Chart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.Chart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.LineChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.LineChart'
update MEVEO_MODULE_ITEM set ITEM_TYPE = 'org.meveo.model.dwh.PieChart' where ITEM_TYPE='org.meveocrm.model.dwh.PieChart'

update BILLING_SERVICE_INSTANCE set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update COM_MESSAGE_TEMPLATE set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update BILLING_INVOICE_CONFIGURATION set DISPLAY_EDRS= case when DISPLAY_EDRS_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISPLAY_EDRS_BOOL is not null
update CAT_OFFER_SERV_TEMPLATES set MANDATORY= case when MANDATORY_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where MANDATORY_BOOL is not null
update AR_CREDIT_CATEGORY set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update AR_DDREQUEST_LOT set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update MEVEO_SCRIPT_INSTANCE set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update ADM_USER set DISABLED= case when DISABLED_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where DISABLED_BOOL is not null
update CAT_RECURRING_CHARGE_TEMPL set SUBSCRIPTION_PRORATA= case when SUBSCRIPTION_PRORATA_BOOL then 1 else 0 end where SUBSCRIPTION_PRORATA_BOOL is not null

AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_COUNTER_PERIOD set NOTIFICATION_LEVELS='{"0":0}'

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update ADM_NOTIFICATION set EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED' where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='ZERO_COUNTER'

update ADM_NOTIF_EMAIL set EMAIL_TO_EL= replace(EMAIL_TO_EL, 'event','event.entity') where EMAIL_TO_EL is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIF_EMAIL set EMAIL_SUBJECT= replace(EMAIL_SUBJECT, 'event','event.entity') where EMAIL_SUBJECT is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')
update ADM_NOTIF_EMAIL set EMAIL_BODY= replace(EMAIL_BODY, 'event','event.entity') where EMAIL_BODY is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIF_EMAIL set EMAIL_HTML_BODY= replace(EMAIL_HTML_BODY, 'event','event.entity') where EMAIL_HTML_BODY is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIF_IM set ID_EXPRESSION= replace(ID_EXPRESSION, 'event','event.entity') where ID_EXPRESSION is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')
update ADM_NOTIF_IM set MESSAGE= replace(MESSAGE, 'event','event.entity') where MESSAGE is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')
update ADM_NOTIF_WEBHOOKS set HTTP_PAGE= replace(HTTP_PAGE, 'event','event.entity') where HTTP_PAGE is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')
update ADM_NOTIF_WEBHOOKS set BODY_EL= replace(BODY_EL, 'event','event.entity') where BODY_EL is not null and id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIF_WEBHOOK_HEADER set headers= replace(headers, 'event','event.entity') where headers is not null and webhook_id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIF_WEBHOOK_PARAM set webhookparams= replace(webhookparams, 'event','event.entity') where webhookparams is not null and webhook_id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

update ADM_NOTIFICATION_PARAMS set params= replace(params, 'event','event.entity') where params is not null and notification_id in (select id from ADM_NOTIFICATION where EVENT_TYPE_FILTER='COUNTER_DEDUCED')

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: update ADM_USER set UUID =concat('USER-', id)

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_SEQ_INVTYP_SELL set id = nextval('bill_seq_it_sell_seq')

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update BILLING_SEQ_INVTYP_SELL set prefix_el = prefixel
update BILLING_SEQ_INVTYP_SELL set sequence_size = sequencesize
update BILLING_SEQ_INVTYP_SELL set current_invoice_nb = currentinvoicenb
